title: [娱乐]PlayerTime——更加强大的在线奖励[全版本]
author: 挂祭人
txt_content:
本帖最后由 1582952890 于 2017-9-16 18:09 编辑 

一款更加强大的在线奖励
简介
这款插件可以帮助你设定在线奖励,虽然MCBBS上已经有很多这类插件,但这一款却与众不同,他支持自定义命令,理论支持所有插件!并且有GUI界面统计在线时间和GUI界面在线时间排行榜!能让玩家GUI查询排行榜,观赏别人的战绩!

理论全版本通用,不支持请回复. 完成汉化!已知BUG:某些1.8以下的版本可能会不支持,解决方法:多试几个版本,[正在加紧汉化]



作者原话:“This awesome plugin keeps track of how long you spend time on a server! It can be a great tool for figuring out how often players are playing and for how long. The plugin also comes with a benchmarks feature, which rewards players after they hit a certain benchmark. All benchmarks are configurable.”

指令:
 /pt help - Shows the help menu. 
/pt - Shows all of your PlayerTime stats! 
/pt [player] - Shows the stats of other players!
 /pt all - Shows the stats of all current players on the server!
 /pt reload - Reloads the configuration file.

权限:playertime.help - /pt help
playertime.others - /pt [player] 
playertime.viewall - /pt all 
playertime.reload - /pt reload


配置文件:
# Set to true to reset the config
RestoreDefaults: false

#Prefix for all the messages.
Prefix: '&9&lPLAYER&7&lTIME &8?'#提示奖励时的前戳,可修改

# All the benchmark settings. Interval is in minutes.
Benchmarks:
  '60':#以秒为单位 [不信看下面的原文]
    broadcast: '&a{player}&7 has played their first 60 minutes!'#达到标准后的全服公告信息
    command: eco give {player} 1000 #得到的指令奖励[默认后台使用]
 '120':#下同
    broadcast: '&a{player}&7 has played for 2 hours!'
    command: eco give {player} 10000
  '300':
    broadcast: '&a{player}&7 has played for 5 hours!'
  '600':
    broadcast: '&a{player}&7 has played for 10 hours!'
  '1440':
    broadcast: '&a{player}&7 has played for 1 whole day!'
    command: eco give {player} 15000
可按照格式自由添加



无人问津的更新历史:1.0.3:
BUG修复
1.0.2:
更好的兼容服务器
1.0.1:
发布插件


最后是期待已久的下载地址
http://pan.baidu.com/s/1jIdOjqQ

连接蹦了楼下回复<-----------------各位回复一下吧,或者评价个分也好!
